participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and nurturing, enjoys sharing knowledge and creativity.
participant_1.background: I like visiting art museums in my spare time. I just started dating someone new. I am in an education program, and hope to teach kindergarten when I graduate. I am a student.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Friendly and resourceful, enjoys helping others and has a playful side.
participant_2.background: I am an award-winning team member. I can do many celebrity impressions. I volunteer in my son's boy scout troop. I work as a plumber.

content.text: Hey! I'm participant_1. What's your name?
participant_2! It's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too! What do you do for work?
Oh, cool! That must be interesting.
It can be. I get to see a lot of different places and meet a lot of different people.
What's your favorite part of your job?
I like helping people. It's nice to know that I'm making a difference in someone's day.
That's a great answer. What do you do for fun?
I like to volunteer in my son's boy scout troop. I also like to do impressions of celebrities.
That's so cool! I can do a few celebrity impressions too.
I can do a pretty good impression of Donald Trump.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to do that.
It's not too hard. Just watch a lot of his speeches and practice.
I'll have to try that. I'm sure it would be a hit at my son's next scout meeting.
I'm sure it would! I'm glad we met. It was nice chatting with you.
Me too. Maybe we can get together again sometime and do some more impressions.
That would be fun! Let's exchange numbers.
